title: Draft test wrap up and plan moving forward
body:
Hi Summoners,

~~~
**TL;DR** - Normal Draft test went well and we will keep the queue open daily between 11am - 3am AEDT for the foreseeable future. We will also regularly review the queue and make adjustments where required.
~~~

https://i.imgur.com/76VyzOP.png

The Normal Draft test period is coming to a close. During the test period we have tried both very conservative (limited days and times) and very aggressive schedules(open every day, most hours). We’ve heard a tonne of positive feedback from you, talking about how you enjoy draft, the bans, role select and lack of mirror match ups. Recently we’ve also seen Draft hold ~20% of all normal games played (when both blind and draft are enabled). 

We’ve seen queue times and match quality maintain a healthy state. So we are happy to announce that Normal Draft will be staying enabled on our server!

Going forward Normal Draft will continue on its current schedule, open every day between 11am to 3am AEDT. We will regularly review the state of the queue to see if we need to increase or decrease the time it is available.

We are committed to providing the best experience we can to OCE players and we hope you all continue to enjoy Normal Draft together.

Thank you for your continued support and good luck on the Rift!

replies.body: Yay yasuo is deleted.
Since normal draft came back I've been hitting SR about as much as I did ARAM and TT. Assigned roles and bans make it so much more enjoyable.
To me, it's ranked without the pressure, and no racing to call roles first. It's very, very nice.
I thought thats what flex queue was kek
Pin this post ðŸ‘
will pin it soon =D. usually we naturally let it sit high for a bit then pin after it starts falling due to age of post.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=K3di8RL9,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-18T23:47:22.158+0000)
>
> will pin it soon =D. usually we naturally let it sit high for a bit then pin after it starts falling due to age of post.

wait you manipulate the post so it 'sits high' omg rito!!!
haha yeah we do pin posts to keep them at the top.
Okay boss  ðŸ‘Œ

Thanks for keeping draft around. 

It is a much better experience than blind pick.

between 11am - 3am AEDT

As of today? Cause I was about to uninstall at the thought of going back to blind pick, gunna be honest.

But thank you ~ This is a reasonable time frame (I really wish it were longer, in the ACTUAL morning instead; living a normal cycle means I'm asleep for half the current times, but it's still so much better than not having it), and it lets me not deal with blind pick.

Now to convince you guys that AutoFill needs to be optional, and I'd have the perfect league experience (yes, I realise my times would triple and other peoples would drop).

EDIT: Wait, AEDT... goddamn Riot, I have to wait until MIDDAY to play league? ... well, probably later, I'm normally making lunch then... oh well, productivity will increase.
I don't see why autofill is such an annoyance. It doesn't happen too often, and you can just play sona/soraka and win bot lane which fufils the meta.

Honestly? If I get filled and I'm playing solo, I dodge. If I'm playing with a mate? ... I normally don't play another - that one game will ruin my night. Yes I have anger issues, yes I'm working on them, yes I try to avoid taking it out on others - but I have never enjoyed playing a game where I was filled. I've won, I've played well, but I've never enjoyed it - and I'm here to enjoy myself, nothing else. To me, that makes these games infuriating, unfortunately.
Not really the kind of player we need then lol. Try find a champ you enjoy for each role. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Im pretty sure if Autofill becomes optional alot of people will leave it off and que times will get longer, maybe include an option to rank roles from most to least preferable in an options setting separate to lobby , that should atleast lower the number of people placed into roles they are really bad at or cant play

Right there's a couple of assumptions I use, but I doubt it;
1) Rito "prefills" matchmaking (find a sit, pencil the name in; if someone with preference come along, pencil them in, check original person second preference, or pencil them into a 'fill' spot based on time)
2) That your time 'in queue' affects your priority in getting a spot
3) That most people would be more infuriated by a longer queue than a 1/6~ chance to get autofill (adc/mid preference, I'm fairly stable 1 in 6; don't know about other preferences)

Basically if you don't want to fill, you're still pencilled in - still second preference checked - but instead of being bumped to fill you're bumped back to queue. You then factor in autofill protection (they shouldn't be kicked back to queue for you; even if you have been there five minutes longer), and a minor to moderate weighting in favour of the autofiller (as a bonus for shortening other queue times, and to "charge" for the perma-autofill protection) et. voila! 

I don't actually think most people would be willing to sit in a queue for 20 minutes - but I'm also certain that there are people like me who gladly -GLADLY - would; it would give those willing to fill shorter times, reduce dodging (which annoys everyone; who hasn't been angry when they got their role, someone dodged, then they got filled), and reduces toxicity and trolling (the whole 'fuck it, got filled, don't care playing to fuck around' mentality).

Yes, I would take a half hour queue over a 10 minute queue and a 20 minute game playing a role I don't want; LoL frustrates me when it's not a game I want - churlish? Probably, my choice? ... well, I'm working on it (blind rage takes a lot to work out; but I do try to refrain from lashing out at my team - I usually succeed as well).
So glad we get to keep this queue. It makes my life a little easier since I join champ select after most people and I'm not sure what role is called half the time.

Oce doesn't have many players~ so I guess currently non rank players are split in modes~ I hope overtime blind pick players will move to draft pick so that later it can be removed resulting in lower q times
times arent even that bad tho no worse then normal imo couple min
normal is like 50 seconds besides during low population times

You should do a 1v1 aram style game type testing in oce, I think that would do really well considering we can't support a 3v3 player base. Which is really sad because we can only get potentially 2 victorious graves chromas, since it was disabled here. I have wanted a 1v1 rank queue type for a long time.

Ranked TT has been on 2 days a week (for limited hours) for a lot of this year. Its recently been expanded to 4 days a week for the final ranked climb@

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-feb-8th

There will definitely be players from OCE getting the TT Victorious Graves Chroma
{{sticker:sg-lux}} yesssssssssssssssssssssssssssss we keep draft !!!!!

Sweet, sweet, music to my ears!

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

YAY! glad to hear that draft is staying open because this is a great step for newer players too to take that step forward before matching up into ranked so they can learn the draft system without the stress of LP
Is there any plans to make draft 24/7? There are still LOADS of people on at 3am, and no one quiet enjoys blind pick.
Thank you, Oceania really needed this. It's a massive quality of life improvement for the server as a whole.

> Thank you, Oceania really needed this. It's a massive quality of life improvement for the server as a whole.

Yep, great experience trying it for the first time today.  
I got my role and someone dodged on the final pick, then someone dodged on the third pick, then dodge again, then I get auto filled. At which point I alt-F4 
There's 11 minutes of my life I'll never get back.
I was blind, but now I see...that blind pick isn't that bad
Yasuo isn't the problem it's Soraka. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Good plan
Why are queues disabled? Isn't it more work turning queues on and off than managing server loads during "off peak" hours?
Pretty sure its automatic, so it isnt really any work
Can you make the time longer? maybe 8 AM to 6 PM
So pleased with this!
Just gonna have to think over this. As all my Mid laners will be banned in norms from this day forth.
I am so happy to hear this. blind pick kind of feels like there is a part of the game missing and as a support main its great to get my roll 90% of games without everyone arguing over top and mid!

I love it.  I can get auto-filled to support and take consolation in the fact I'll get top or mid next game.  I can try out work on learning/mastering more champs for my pool, without having to play 'quickest typist gets their role'.  I can theorycraft with greater ease.  Draft Pick is a godsend for me, thanks Rito!  

{{sticker:katarina-love}}
no more yasuo no more cancer gj lol{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} I'm outta here
yes do that
Should we only keep one queue opened during week days and all opened on weekend ? I acknowledge a quite long waiting time to get into a game when both queues are opened. Just my 2 cents

Why dont you allow people to select their role before entering a Normal game (don't worry about the draft). It would get rid of people spamming their role, autolocking, Mid or feed etc . Just seems like common sense.

I think eventually we would like to do that, but that takes a lot of dev work and needs to be weighed up against everything else we do. Until that happens though we really wanted to give our players an alternate experience in Draft. Especially since 10 bans and role select came in.

TIme to make TT available everyday ??

Why not have ranked and normal TT available?
